titleStmt.title: The shoemaker beyond his last, or, A satyr upon scurrilous poets especially Ned W----d, author of a poem intituled A journey to hell, or, A visit paid to the Devil.
titleStmt.author: Burridge, Richard, b. 1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for S. Cook and are to be sold by most booksellers,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: Pages stained and torn, with slight loss of print.
Attributed by Wing to Richard Burridge.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
